content: I'll show everyone around after we all settle in â€” Familiarize ourselves with this place until it becomes a part of our lives.
Ah! <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, pardon me. Remember to claim your <color=#8AAB4B>tent</color> from <color=#8AAB4B>Glenn</color>, hoho.

What should we do after setting up the tent...
Hoho,
No need to rush, everything can wait for a cup of tea.
